name: PublishParasoftResults
description: Publish Parasoft results to Azure Pipelines
author: Parasoft Corporation

inputs.name: resultsFiles
inputs.label: Results files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Results files path. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](https://aka.ms/minimatchexamples)

inputs.name: searchFolder
inputs.label: Search folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder to search for the test result files. Defaults to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: parasoftToolOrJavaRootPath
inputs.label: Root path to Parasoft tool/Java installation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute location of the root path of a Parasoft tool (Jtest, dotTest, or C/C++test that includes a Java installation) or a standalone Java installation. When found at the specified location, Java optimizes the efficiency of report processing. Otherwise, report processing will be significantly slower and may encounter memory issues when handling large reports.

inputs.name: localSettingsPath
inputs.label: Settings
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Relative location in project check out directory or absolute location for settings file to load rule documentation.
 \- configure "dtp.url" property to specify DTP server address.

inputs.name: referenceBuild
inputs.label: Reference build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a reference build to use if Parasoft Quality Gates task is configured. To use the last successful build, leave this field empty. Specify the reference build number - this can be found in the pipeline run title after the '#' and before '•' symbol - e.g. the build number is 20 if the title contains "#20 •".

inputs.name: failOnFailures
inputs.label: Fail if there are any failures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the task if there are any test failures or static analysis violations. Check this option to fail the task if test failures or static analysis violations are detected in the result files.

inputs.name: testRunTitle
inputs.label: Test run title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the Test Run.

inputs.name: mergeTestResults
inputs.label: Merge test results
inputs.helpMarkDown: A test run is created for each results file. Check this option to merge results into a single test run.

inputs.name: publishRunAttachments
inputs.label: Upload test results files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Opt in/out of publishing test run level attachments. If selected, test result files will be uploaded and attached to test run

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platform for which the tests were run.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration for which the tests were run.
